title: PLEASE HELP
body: I have 3 accounts. This one is my 3rd. I have a pbe and my main account. I cant start a discussion with my main Firebreathen account  because it says I'm perma banned when ive never even posted anything on the boards. And I don't know why but my Firebreathen account is my pbe and its disabled. I haven't gotten an email saying it was banned tho. I just wanna play on it. Replay as fast as possible please.

replies.body:
First, it sounded like your first account Firebreathen wasn't synced to the boards. I went ahead and did that so that you are able to post from that account here. As for the PBE account, you will need to submit a ticket for an [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Make sure to answer all the questions and our AR team will look into helping you get that back. 

If you have any other questions make sure you reach out to us.
And using the email to this account is useless because I used a random one. Email the one to Firebreathen if you need to reply.
